# CodeGuard Security Instructions

All `codeguard-*.instructions.md` files in this directory are from [Project CodeGuard](https://project-codeguard.org/getting-started/#installation).

Project CodeGuard is an open-source security framework from Cisco that embeds secure-by-default practices into AI coding workflows. These instruction files provide comprehensive security rules across multiple domains to guide AI assistants in generating more secure code automatically.

## Installation Source

These files were obtained from: https://project-codeguard.org/getting-started/#installation
